top.parak.kraft.core.node

类 NodeGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • top.parak.kraft.core.node.NodeGroup

  • @NotThreadSafe
public class NodeGroup
extends Object
    Node group.

    Used to record the members in cluster and find members.

    从以下版本开始:
    2022-03-19
    作者:
    KHighness

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      NodeGroup(Collection<NodeEndpoint> endpoints, NodeId selfId)
      Create group with node list(group).
      NodeGroup(NodeEndpoint endpoint)
      Create group with single node(standalone).

    • 构造器详细资料

      • NodeGroup

        public NodeGroup(NodeEndpoint endpoint)
        Create group with single node(standalone).
        参数:
        endpoint - endpoint

      • NodeGroup

        public NodeGroup(Collection<NodeEndpoint> endpoints,
                 NodeId selfId)
        Create group with node list(group).
        参数:
        endpoints - endpoints
        selfId - self id

    • 方法详细资料

      • isStandalone

        public boolean isStandalone()
        Check if member is unique one in group, in other word, check if standalone mode.
        返回:
        true if only one member and the id of member equals to specified id, otherwise false

      • getCountOfMajor

        public int getCountOfMajor()
        Get count of major.

        For election.

        返回:
        count
        另请参阅:
        GroupMember.isMajor()

      • findSelf

        @Nonnull
public GroupMember findSelf()
        Find self.
        返回:
        self

      • findMember

        @Nonnull
public GroupMember findMember(NodeId id)
        Find member by id.

        Thrown exception if member not found.

        参数:
        id - id
        返回:
        member, never be null

      • getMember

        @Nullable
public GroupMember getMember(NodeId id)
        Get member by id.
        参数:
        id - id
        返回:
        member, maybe null

      • isMemberOfMajor

        public boolean isMemberOfMajor(NodeId id)
        Check if node is major member.
        参数:
        id - id
        返回:
        true if member exists and member id major, otherwise false.

      • upgrade

        public void upgrade(NodeId id)
        Upgrade member to major member.
        参数:
        id - id
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if member not found
        另请参阅:
        findMember(NodeId)

      • downgrade

        public void downgrade(NodeId id)
        Downgrade member (set major to false).
        参数:
        id - id
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if member not found

      • addNode

        public GroupMember addNode(NodeEndpoint endpoint,
                           int nextIndex,
                           int matchIndex,
                           boolean major)
        Add member to group.
        参数:
        endpoint - endpoint
        nextIndex - next index
        matchIndex - match index
        返回:
        added member

      • removeNode

        public void removeNode(NodeId id)
        Remove member.
        参数:
        id - id

      • updateNodes

        public void updateNodes(Set<NodeEndpoint> endpoints)

      • resetReplicatingStates

        public void resetReplicatingStates(int nextLogIndex)
        Reset replicating state.
        参数:
        nextLogIndex - next log index

      • getMatchIndexOfMajor

        public int getMatchIndexOfMajor()
        Get match index of major members.

        To get match index of major in group, sort match indexes and get the middle one.

        返回:
        match index

      • listReplicationTarget

        public Collection<GroupMember> listReplicationTarget()
        List replication target.

        Self is not replication target

        返回:
        replication targets

      • listEndpointOfMajor

        public Set<NodeEndpoint> listEndpointOfMajor()
        List endpoint of major members.
        返回:
        endpoints

      • listEndpointOfMajorExceptSelf

        public Set<NodeEndpoint> listEndpointOfMajorExceptSelf()
        List endpoint of major members except self.
        返回:
        endpoints except self
